item.description:
First Meet Up in January! The theme? Comfort Food!
What do you think of when you think Comfort Food? That is what you should plan to bring and/or prepare at this event. We'll want to know why it is your comfort food so be prepared to share your recipe and your story over dinner.
Location address in West Hartford will be shared after RSVP.
All adult folk are welcome. I am new to Connecticut and hope to make this a monthly event with a good mix of ages and personalities.
item.how_to_find_us: It will be at my flat. I will email all the yes responces with the address.
item.why: This will be fun because food always berings folks together. I've done cooking clubs before and they are always so much fun! We might play a board game after eatting or not...anything is possible.
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes January Meetup
